Verona udarila kontru: Laže Baloteli! Kakav rasizam, samo smo ga zadirkivali
Ivan Jurić uverava da ne razloga da se stvari preuveličavaju

03 Nov 2019

Opet je Mario Baloteli dospeo na udarne strane italijanskih medija. Ponovo ne zbog fudbala. Kontroverzni napadač je pretio da će napustiti teren stadiona „Bentegodi“ pod izgovorom da je meta rasističkih napada.
A u taboru njegovog rivala uveravaju da je ponašanje tamnoputog napadača Breše neprhvatljivo, jer, kažu domaćini, rasizma nije ni bilo.„Ne plašim se da kažem, ništa se nije desilo“, poručuje Ivan Jurić, trener Verone, koja je savladala goste 2:1.
Prema njegovim rečima ceo slučaj je preuveličan.„Bilo je zvižduka, zadirkivaja, ne i rasističkih povika. Uopšte ih nije bilo i nemojte da pravimo skandal tamo gde ga nema. Hrvat sam, znam kako je kad ti sa tribina poručuju da si „cigansko g...“, jer se to nažalost dešava na italijanskim terenima, ali ovoga puta baš se ništa nije desilo“.



Ostaje onda dilema šta je podstaklo Marija Balotelija da gnevno reaguje, šutne loptu ka tribinama, zapreti da će otići u svlačionicu pre vremena...„Pitajte Balotelija zašto je tako reagovao. Nemam problem da priznam ako je bilo uvreda sa tribina, i sam ih se užasavam, čak i kad dolaze od mojih navijala, ali je laž da je danas u Veroni bilo rasizma. Nemojte da pričamo gluposti“, dodao je Ivan Jurić.
I predsednik kluba za koji igra srpski reprezenativac Darko Lazović, Mauricio Seti, demantovao je rasističko ponašanje sa tribina.„Rasizam u Veroni ne postiji. Niko ništa nije čuo na stadionu. Ne možemo da kontorlišemo ponašanje 20.000 gledalaca, ali vas uveravam da naši navijači jesu ironični, ali nisu rasiti“, zaključio je Seti.

Verona hits the counter: Lies Balotelli! What racism, we just teased him
Ivan Juric assures that there is no reason to exaggerate things

03 Nov 2019

Once again, Mario Baloteli has hit the brunt of the Italian media. Again not for football. The controversial attacker has threatened to leave the grounds of Bentegodi Stadium on the pretext that he is the target of racist attacks.
And in the camp of his rival, they assure that the behavior of the dark-skinned striker Brescia is unacceptable because, according to the hosts, there was no racism either. 1.
According to him, the whole case was exaggerated. "There were whistles, teases, not racist cries. There were none at all and don't make a scandal where there is none. I'm Croatian, I know how it is when you are told from the stands that you are a "gypsy g ..." because unfortunately this is happening on Italian grounds, but this time nothing really happened. "



The dilemma then is what prompted Maria Balotelli to react angrily, kick the ball into the stands, threaten to go to the locker room ahead of time ... “Ask Balotelli why he reacted like that. I have no problem admitting if there were insults from the stands, and I am horrified of them, even when they come from my cheerleaders, but the lie is that there was racism in Verona today. Let's not talk nonsense, "added Ivan Juric.
And club president, played by Serbian Rep. Darko Lazovic, Mauricio Seti, has denied racist behavior from the stands. "Racism in Verona does not fast. Nobody heard anything in the stadium. We cannot control the behavior of the 20,000 spectators, but I can assure you that our fans are ironic but not racial, ”Seti concluded.
